00028 FXDEFMAP(RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer) AddServerMap[]={
00029   //____Message_Type_____________ID_______________Message_Handler_______
00030   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::ID_NYI, RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::onNotYetImplemented),
00031   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::ID_BTN_OK, RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::onOkClicked),
00032   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::ID_BTN_CANCEL, RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::onCancelClicked),
00033 
00034 };

00036 FXIMPLEMENT(RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer,FXDialogBox,AddServerMap,ARRAYNUMBER(AddServerMap));

00043 RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::AddServer(FXApp *a)
00044   :FXDialogBox(a, "Add a new server", DECOR_TITLE|DECOR_BORDER|DECOR_RESIZE)
00045 {
00046   // The root frame
00047   FXVerticalFrame *root =new FXVerticalFrame(this,LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00048 
00049   FXString lab1="Enter the server's information and click the button \n"
00050     "to add it. Click the cancel button to abort.";
00051   FXLabel* labHelp=new FXLabel(root, lab1, 0, LABEL_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00052 
00053   // The info matrix
00054   FXMatrix *frInfo = new FXMatrix(root, 2, MATRIX_BY_COLUMNS,LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00055   FXLabel* labServerName   =new FXLabel(frInfo, "Name");
00056   tfServerName=new FXTextField(frInfo, 20 );
00057   FXLabel* labServerIp     =new FXLabel(frInfo, "IP adress");
00058   tfServerIp  =new FXTextField(frInfo, 20 );
00059   FXLabel* labServerPort   =new FXLabel(frInfo, "Listening port");
00060   tfServerPort=new FXTextField(frInfo, 20 );
00061   FXLabel* labServerCli    =new FXLabel(frInfo, "Maximum allowed clients");
00062   tfServerCli =new FXTextField(frInfo, 20 );
00063 
00064   // The description
00065   FXLabel* labDesc=new FXLabel(root, "Description :", 0, 
00066                                LABEL_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00067   txtDesc=new FXText(root, NULL, 0,LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00068 
00069   // The technote
00070   FXLabel* labTech=new FXLabel(root, "Technical note :", 0, 
00071                                LABEL_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00072   txtTech=new FXText(root, NULL, 0,LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00073 
00074   // The buttons
00075   FXHorizontalFrame *btnFrame = new FXHorizontalFrame(root,LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00076   FXuint btnOpts= LAYOUT_RIGHT|BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH ;
00077   FXint btnWidth=120;
00078   FXButton* btn1=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Cancel", NULL, this, 
00079                                ID_BTN_CANCEL, btnOpts, 0, 0, btnWidth);
00080   btn1->setDefault(true);
00081   FXButton* btn2=new FXButton( btnFrame, "OK", NULL, this, ID_BTN_OK, 
00082                                BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH, 0, 0, btnWidth);
00083 
00084   errorMsg="";
00085 }

00095   delete txtDesc;

00121 long RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::
00122 onNotYetImplemented(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){

00139 long RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::
00140 onOkClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00141   LOGI("OK button clicked");
00142 
00143   // Makes some controls
00144   if (controls()){   // We can add the server
00145     addServer();
00146     handle(this, FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND, FXDialogBox::ID_ACCEPT), NULL);
00147   }
00148   else{              // An error occured
00149     FXMessageBox::information(this, MBOX_OK, "Validation error", errorMsg);
00150   }
00151   return 1;
00152 }
00153 
00165 long RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::
00166 onCancelClicked(FXObject *o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00167   LOGI("Cancel button clicked");
00168   handle(this, FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND, FXDialogBox::ID_CANCEL), NULL);
00169   return 1;
00170 }

00180 bool RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::controls(){
00181   bool ret=true;
00182   FXString serverName = tfServerName->getText();
00183   FXString serverIp   = tfServerIp->getText();
00184 
00185   // Tests the server IP adress
00186   if(serverIp.empty()){
00187     errorMsg="The server's IP address cannot be empty";
00188     ret=false;
00189   }
00190 
00191   // Tests the server name
00192   if(serverName.empty()){
00193     errorMsg="The server's name cannot be empty";
00194     ret=false;
00195   }
00196 
00197   return ret;
00198 }
00199 
00207 void RainbruRPG::Gui::AddServer::addServer(){
00208   std::string name(tfServerName->getText().text());
00209   std::string ip  (tfServerIp->getText().text());
00210   std::string port(tfServerPort->getText().text());
00211   std::string cli (tfServerCli->getText().text());
00212   std::string desc(txtDesc->getText().text());
00213   std::string tech(txtTech->getText().text());
00214   LOGI("Setting posted data :");
00215 
00216   LOGCATS("Server name : '");
00217   LOGCATS(name.c_str());
00218   LOGCATS("'");
00219   LOGCAT();
00220 
00221   LOGCATS("Server IP : '");
00222   LOGCATS(ip.c_str());
00223   LOGCATS("'");
00224   LOGCAT();
00225 
00226   LOGCATS("Server port : '");
00227   LOGCATS(port.c_str());
00228   LOGCATS("'");
00229   LOGCAT();
00230 
00231   LOGCATS("Server maxClients : '");
00232   LOGCATS(cli.c_str());
00233   LOGCATS("'");
00234   LOGCAT();
00235 
00236   CurlServerAdd csa;
00237   csa.setName(name);
00238   csa.setIpAddress(ip);
00239   csa.setPort(port);
00240   csa.setMaxClients(cli);
00241   csa.setDescription( desc);
00242   csa.setTechNote( tech);
00243   //  csa.setPostedData("technote", tech);
00244   bool per=csa.perform();
00245 
00246   if (per){
00247     LOGI("The form was correctly posted");
00248   }
00249   else{
00250     HttpResponse hr;
00251     long resp=csa.getServerResponse();
00252     const char* mes=hr.getMessage(resp);
00253     LOGCATS("HTTP rsponse :");
00254     LOGCATS(mes);
00255   }
00256 }
